title: authme链接dsicuz的注册以后，进服变得很慢
author: 白可乐
txt_content:
RT
使用discuz注册以后，进服会提示登陆中，很慢
而且有时候会莫名其妙的让重新注册

而且也会提示刷东西
内容如下：
[20:35:15] [AuthMe-CacheLoader/WARN]: [AuthMe-CacheLoader] WARN fr.xephi.authme.libs.com.zaxxer.hikari.pool.PoolBase - AuthMeMYSQLPool - Failed to validate connection com.mysql.jdbc.JDBC4Connection@1d02c975 (No operations allowed after connection closed.). Possibly consider using a shorter maxLifetime value. [20:35:17] [Craft Scheduler Thread - 45/WARN]: [Craft Scheduler Thread - 45] WARN fr.xephi.authme.libs.com.zaxxer.hikari.pool.PoolBase - AuthMeMYSQLPool - Failed to validate connection com.mysql.jdbc.JDBC4Connection@177917be (No operations allowed after connection closed.). Possibly consider using a shorter maxLifetime value. [20:35:20] [AuthMe-CacheLoader/WARN]: [AuthMe-CacheLoader] WARN fr.xephi.authme.libs.com.zaxxer.hikari.pool.PoolBase - AuthMeMYSQLPool - Failed to validate connection com.mysql.jdbc.JDBC4Connection@52dd456c (No operations allowed after connection closed.). Possibly consider using a shorter maxLifetime value. [20:35:22] [Craft Scheduler Thread - 45/WARN]: [Craft Scheduler Thread - 45] WARN fr.xephi.authme.libs.com.zaxxer.hikari.pool.PoolBase - AuthMeMYSQLPool - Failed to validate connection com.mysql.jdbc.JDBC4Connection@19befb21 (No operations allowed after connection closed.). Possibly consider using a shorter maxLifetime value. [20:35:25] [AuthMe-CacheLoader/WARN]: [AuthMe-CacheLoader] WARN fr.xephi.authme.libs.com.zaxxer.hikari.pool.PoolBase - AuthMeMYSQLPool - Failed to validate connection com.mysql.jdbc.JDBC4Connection@591f6723 (No operations allowed after connection closed.). Possibly consider using a shorter maxLifetime value. [20:35:27] [Craft Scheduler Thread - 45/WARN]: [Craft Scheduler Thread - 45] WARN fr.xephi.authme.libs.com.zaxxer.hikari.pool.PoolBase - AuthMeMYSQLPool - Failed to validate connection com.mysql.jdbc.JDBC4Connection@1d817cce (No operations allowed after connection closed.). Possibly consider using a shorter maxLifetime value. [20:35:30] [AuthMe-CacheLoader/WARN]: [AuthMe-CacheLoader] WARN fr.xephi.authme.libs.com.zaxxer.hikari.pool.PoolBase - AuthMeMYSQLPool - Failed to validate connection com.mysql.jdbc.JDBC4Connection@7dd8651 (No operations allowed after connection closed.). Possibly consider using a shorter maxLifetime value. [20:35:32] [Craft Scheduler Thread - 45/WARN]: [Craft Scheduler Thread - 45] WARN fr.xephi.authme.libs.com.zaxxer.hikari.pool.PoolBase - AuthMeMYSQLPool - Failed to validate connection com.mysql.jdbc.JDBC4Connection@5883f11a (No operations allowed after connection closed.). Possibly consider using a shorter maxLifetime value. [20:35:35] [AuthMe-CacheLoader/WARN]: [AuthMe-CacheLoader] WARN fr.xephi.authme.libs.com.zaxxer.hikari.pool.PoolBase - AuthMeMYSQLPool - Failed to validate connection com.mysql.jdbc.JDBC4Connection@4183c0a5 (No operations allowed after connection closed.). Possibly consider using a shorter maxLifetime value. [20:35:37] [Craft Scheduler Thread - 45/WARN]: [Craft Scheduler Thread - 45] WARN fr.xephi.authme.libs.com.zaxxer.hikari.pool.PoolBase - AuthMeMYSQLPool - Failed to validate connection com.mysql.jdbc.JDBC4Connection@718d953 (No operations allowed after connection closed.). Possibly consider using a shorter maxLifetime value. [20:35:37] [Craft Scheduler Thread - 45/WARN]: [AuthMe] Player 'WhiteCola' wasn't online during login process, aborted...
一直刷新这个，解决了可以支付红包
并非涉及到私下交易

replies.author: xmdhs
replies.txt_content:
Failed to validate connection 复制代码

数据库的密码错了？有并发限制？

replies.author: 白可乐
a26605483
replies.txt_content: 建议你购买一个阿里云最便宜的VPS来做数据库，虚拟机的数据库卡是正常的，因为来回数据加上域名解析，在加上authme不是异步登录的插件。

replies.author: 白可乐
replies.txt_content:
a26605483 发表于 2018-12-17 14:20
建议你购买一个阿里云最便宜的VPS来做数据库，虚拟机的数据库卡是正常的，因为来回数据加上域名解析，在加 ...
推荐一个购买的地址呗，我找不到便宜的啊
